content.rendered:
Eat the rainbow with this colourful unicorn wrap filled with bright veggies. Who knows, maybe you’ll find a pot of gold waiting for you at the other end of the table… Go take a look!

Ingredients

Ingredients
2 Fry’s Chicken-Style Burgers or 2 Fry’s Golden Crumbed Schnitzels or 8 Fry’s Chicken-Style Nuggets
2 wraps
A handful of cherry tomatoes, thinly sliced
½ yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced
1 avocado, diced
1 carrot, sliced in julienned strips
¼ cup red cabbage, shredded
¼ cup red cabbage, shredded
A handful of cherry tomatoes, sliced
4 tbsp vegan mayonnaise

Directions

Cook the burgers, schnitzels or nuggets according to the packaging instructions.

Slice them into bite-sized pieces.

Lay out the wraps on a clean surface. Layer the veggies to form a rainbow shape.

Add 1 tbsp of mayonnaise at each end of the rainbow to form two “clouds”. Repeat for the other wrap.

When you’re ready to eat, roll up the wraps and slice in half.
